scripts.link-root-dist: cd ../../ && npm link @streammachine/nodejs-driver && cd ./examples/node && npm link @streammachine/nodejs-driver
scripts.unlink-root-dist: npm unlink @streammachine/nodejs-driver && npm i ../../streammachine-nodejs-driver-1.0.0.tgz && cd ../../ && npm unlink @streammachine/nodejs-driver && npm i
